Package com.iontrading.mkv

Class MkvComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iontrading.mkv.MkvComponent
  • @Keep
@KeepPublicClassMemberNames
public class MkvComponent
extends Object
    The MkvComponent class wraps a ION Bus component in a Java Object.

    This class provides information about components registered with the platform along with the application.

    The availability status of ION components is notified via MkvPlatformListener listener invocations.

    See Also:
    MkvPlatformListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getAPIVersion()
      Returns the API version used by this component.
      String getApplicationVersion()
      Returns this component application's version.
      String getBridge()
      Return the bridge component name (i.e.: the platform bridge name or the web server name) which actually registered the component, if any.
      String getHost()
      Returns this component host ip address.
      String getHostName()
      Returns this component host name.
      String getHWInfo()
      Returns this component HW information string.
      String getName()
      Returns this component name.
      int getPort()
      Returns the port number used by this component to accept incoming connections.
      String getType()
      Returns this component type.
      String getUserName()
      Returns this component login user.
      boolean isBridged()
      Returns true if the component has been registered via bridge / web server.

      • isBridged

        public boolean isBridged()
        Returns true if the component has been registered via bridge / web server.
        Returns:

      • getBridge

        public String getBridge()
        Return the bridge component name (i.e.: the platform bridge name or the web server name) which actually registered the component, if any.
        Returns:
        the bridge name, which actually registered the component on-behalf-of, or null if the component is not registered via bridge.
